title: Mathematics-Based Sustainability Education: Activity-Centered Microlearning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts (statistics, data analysis) and general understanding of environmental issues
context.additional_context: Mobile app-based activity learning in a BYOD environment. Emphasizes solving sustainability issues through mathematical modeling.

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic mathematical models (e.g., carbon footprint calculation formulas) for analyzing sustainability indicators.
Learners can quantify sustainability issues in local communities using data and propose solutions.
Learners can develop sustainability action plans based on knowledge acquired through activity-based learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
